titles.title: A resolution designating June as "National Annuity Awareness Month".
A resolution designating June as "National Annuity Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
National Annuity Awareness Month
This resolution designates June as National Annuity Awareness Month and calls on the United States and other public and private entities to observe the Month with appropriate programs and activities.
